s0772: Sima Qian said: When Chu Ling Wang was assembling the feudal lords at Shen, executing Qi Qing Feng, building the Zhang Hua Terrace, and seeking the Zhou nine ding tripods, his ambitions encompassed the whole world;
s0773: yet he starved to death in Shen Hai's house, becoming a laughingstock to the world.
s0774: That his conduct could not achieve this - how sad!
s0775: Can one not be careful about power's influence on people?
s0776: Qi Ji established himself through disorder, doted on and was corrupted by the Qin woman - how extreme! He nearly destroyed the state twice!
